price: 12. Kaadu tet dirabbossam matan, ummaan caddok taturliy maggo dambilih yani akke waytek.
arabic: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِۦٓ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعۡتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā yukadhibu bihi illā kullu muʿ'tadin athīmin
